MISSISSIPPI SOUTHERN COLLEGE
DIVISION OF SPEECH ARTS
STATION A • BOX 52 • HATTIESBURG. MISSISSIPPI
October 11, 1956
Mr. Harold E. Hill
Associate Director
NA of EB
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Hill:
I would like to add WMSU, Mississippi Southern1s
ten wait wired-wireless station to the active member¬
ship of the National Association of Educational Broad¬
casters .
The dues of $15.00 for class C membership are
being forwarded to you.
I am not interested in using the facilities of the
NAEB Radio Network.
Sincerely,
Thomas B. Maclin, Jr.
Director, Radio-Television
